attributes.action: Stop changing british laws, flags and celebrations (patron saints) to please the foreigners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have for years accepted the foreigners into our country, and we have accepted their religious beliefs, so why should we change ours because it supposedly offends them? We have had our patron saints, flags and all celebrations for hundreds of years if the foreigners coming in dont like them tough, we have to let them do their own celebrations. Leave us to do ours.
